You woke up, remembering absolutely nothing beyond the beginning of this sentence. You were in a bedroom, on the bed in the corner. On the opposite side, you could see a tall red closet. In the center of the wall between the two, there was a massive octagonal window above a small wooden shelf. The window was closed, so you couldn't tell if it was day or night. The only light came from a lantern on a small table next to the front of the bed. On the other end of the bed there was a small white rug, and across from that, there was a small stool and desk below a square mirror.

Oh, and you were -- at best -- a couple inches tall.

And someone was coming. You dove under the covers, which were near the edge of the bed, as the door opened. The person's vibrating footsteps drew closer to the bed, and they said "Ugh...training. You'd think Tenzin would lighten up every now and then, but nooo." The voice was feminine, albeit husky and magnified by the immense difference in sizes. There was a pause. You heard the sound of clothing hitting the ground, and then the sound of feet sliding out of boots. You crept closer to the edge of the bed to take a look...

You were not prepared for your mystery host to jump into bed. What happened?
